"Ice Cream" - A new type of ice cream that comes in-sized portions, perfect-sized portions for a-sized person.
"Ice Cream-ing" - A new trend that involves taking an ice cream cone and holding it upside down, letting the ice cream drip down your arm in a way that resembles a rain shower.
"Ice Cream-ing" - A new way to-ize your ice cream by pouring it into a cup and adding-sized scoops of toppings on top.
"Ice Cream Carl" - A new-sized ice cream truck that can be driven around and serve ice cream-sized portions.
"Ice Cream Carl" - A new ice cream-ing machine that can be used to make ice cream-sized portions of ice cream in a matter of minutes.
